programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S09E02, The murder of an Ohio woman in 1974 is solved more than 20 years later after police get a crucial clue--the woman's husband was seen building a coffin-shaped box about the time the woman disappeared.

programme.title: Devil In Disguise
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E06, A 23-year-old teacher vanished the evening before Easter after giving confession. Her body was later found floating in a drainage canal. At the time, a key witness hinted that a member of the Catholic clergy may have been responsible.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E03, While hiking with husband Dennis in Montana, Leslee Larson fell into Wolf Creek. Then Dennis is convicted of murdering his wife, while in Main. And 15-year-old papergirl Penny Parker goes missing, then her body is found by a search volunteer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E06, A videotape made at an ATM machine helps police in Louisville, KY, to nab a man suspected of raping 13 women. And a DA investigator in Georgia helps crack a murder case that his father, a police chief, first worked on 30 years before.

programme.title: Killings on Christmas Eve
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E02, A family is torn apart by their grandparents' murders. Two decades later, a cold case detective takes on the case that has haunted him since he was a child--racing to solve it before the family takes matters into their own hands.

programme.title: The Voice In The Lake
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E01, When 31-year-old real estate appraiser Mike Williams mysteriously vanishes while duck hunting in the Florida swamps in December of 2000, authorities suspect he accidentally drowned. For sixteen years his disappearance remains a mystery.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E05, College student Brad Perry shows up to work his graveyard shift at the gas station and is never seen alive again.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E23, When a woman is found murdered in her mobile home, police make two shocking discoveries--her husband may not only have been the killer, but he may have also killed his first wife 31 years before.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E23, The brutal stabbing murder of a Florida woman is solved when police find crucial DNA evidence in spit left on the pavement. And a man is put away for rape and murder when his footprint matches the footprint he left at the crime scene 18 years before.

programme.title: Traces Of Murder/The Bathtub Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E09, A killer helps convict himself when he boasts about his crime to prison cellmates; and New Hampshire investigators probing the murder of a pregnant woman found raped, strangled, and dumped into her bathtub, get a new lead.

programme.title: Missing in Altoona
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E03, When Sherry Leighty goes missing in 1999, her family is left wondering how a dedicated mother of three could vanish without a trace. A decade later, the cold case heats up when Sherry's sister launches a social media campaign.

programme.title: Gone in a New York Minute
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E02, In a city of eight million, landlord Bruce Blackwood disappears without a trace in March 2006. Though there is no body, the NYPD is sure this is a homicide and they spend the next nine years searching for answers.

programme.title: The Clock Strikes Murder
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E16, When 23-year-old Tonya McKinley is found brutally murdered on New Years Day 1985, a little boy is left motherless. A family must wait 35 years for advancements in forensic science to finally catch a killer using familial DNA.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E24, A mother is suspected in the murders of two of her daughters when her third daughter finally convinces police to reopen two cold cases.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E20, DNA found on a marijuana joint in Florida in 2005 helps to solve the 1988 rape and murder of a California woman. And a cold case of murder in Illinois heats up when a jailhouse lawyer turns jailhouse snitch.

programme.title: Left for Dead / On the Case (#126)
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E25, A detective in California tracks down a prostitute's killer with the help of a key piece of evidence. And two persistent cold case detectives use DNA to investigate the 1990 murder of a woman and the death of a man killed in a car crash in 1988.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E14, A serial rapist seals his own fate when he sends a taunting letter to police. And when a man is found dead in South Dakota, his head bashed in by a 50-pound rock, investigators go on a 20-year search for the killers.

MST3K: The Final Sacrifice, 19980725000000 +0000, With the help of a mysterious map and a truck-driving drifter named Rowsdower, young Troy McGreggor sets out on a dark adventure across Alberta in search of the answers behind the hooded cult responsible for his father's grisly murder.
MST3K: The Painted Hills, 20170901070000 +0000, A Lassie movie, set in 1870s California amongst rival gold miners. The 1950s-era short teaches college students how to improve their hygiene.
MST3K: Parts: The Clonus Horror, 19970607000000 +0000, Scientists run a clone farm for VIPs while Pearl and her goons are forced into babysitting omnipotent Space Children.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Junior Rodeo Daredevils
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E16, A prank gone wrong leads to children taking on a dangerous new sport.
Film Crew: Hollywood After Dark, 20070710070000 +0000, The Film Crew gives a commentary track to Walk the Angry Beach, aka Hollywood After Dark, featuring Rue McClanahan as a stripper.
MST3K: The She-Creature, 19970405000000 +0000, The SOL crew is subjected to a dark, dreary tale of hypnotism, murder, and chesty amphibians.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Hired! (Part 2)
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E18, Advance your career by finishing this enlightening two-part short featuring timeless sales advice.

MST3K: Time Chasers, 19971121000000 +0000, A college professor and a reporter go through time in a modified light plane to stop a corporation from using his invention to accidentally create a dystopian future.

MST3K: Tormented, 19920926000000 +0000, In Tormented, jazz pianist Tom Stewart, soon to marry the woman he loves, watches former love Vi Mason fall from a lighthouse and does not save her. Vi’s spirit returns and begins to torment Tom at his every step.

Film Crew: Killers From Space, 20070807070000 +0000, Former Mystery Science Theater 3000 crew rip apart Killers from Space.

Stargate, 19941028000000 +0000, When an ancient Egyptian artifact is discovered, two men unlock its secret power as a portal through time and space.

Stargate Origins: Catherine, 20180619000000 +0000, 'Stargate Origins' follows Catherine Langford, whose father, archeologist Paul Langford, discovered the eponymous Stargate in 1928, when Catherine was a young girl. Young Catherine explores the mysteries of the Stargate in an attempt to save Earth.

Stargate: Continuum, 20080729000000 +0000, In this adrenaline-driven, action-adventure, members of SG-1 find themselves returning to a world where their history has been dramatically altered and the Stargate program never existed! Richard Dean Anderson, Beau Bridges, and Michael Shanks star.

Stargate: The Ark of Truth, 20080101080000 +0000, When the SG-1 crew discovers that a final assault on Earth is in the works and a double-agent is scheming among them, their mission takes on a new meaning as they travel to the Ori's home galaxy to overtake their arch enemy before it's too late.

programme.title: Chimera
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E15, Daniel experiences strange dreams centered around his possible knowledge of the Lost City of the Ancients. Suspicious that Daniel's mind is being manipulated, the team must find a way to help him while keeping the secret from the Goa'uld.

programme.title: Death Knell
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E16, Carter flees from a super warrior with a piece of technology that may be the key to defeating Anubis's new army. Injured and unarmed, Carter must use all her training to stay alive, while O'Neill and Teal'c race to find her before it's too late.

programme.title: The Shrine
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E06, On a flight back to Atlantis, McKay inexplicably falls ill. Fearing the worst, the doctor summons McKay’s sister to say her goodbyes. But Ronan tells Jeannie of a shrine that would grant Rodney one day to be himself again, before he dies.

programme.title: Whispers
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E07, Dr. Beckett (Paul McGillion) is asked to delay his departure from Atlantis when word comes that Major Anne Teldy (Christina Cox) and her away team have stumbled onto one of Michael’s abandoned labs inside an extensive underground catacomb.

programme.title: The Queen
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E08, Keller and the Atlantis team meet with the Wraith, Todd, to deliver a startling proposition. Keller believes she has found a cure for the Wraiths of their need to feed on humans but requires a test subject for this breakthrough treatment.

programme.title: Tracker
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E09, McKay and Ronan volunteer to assist Dr. Jennifer Keller with a medical follow-up away from Atlantis. Later, when the pair return to her, they are surprised to learn that she left earlier but a search of the village turns up no sign of her.

programme.title: First Contact
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E10, Stargate SG-1’s Dr. Daniel Jackson (Michael Shanks) travels to Atlantis when his research suggests that a rebellious Ancient scientist named Janus (Gildart Jackson) may have hidden a secret lab somewhere within the city.

programme.title: The Lost Tribe
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E11, Jackson and McKay have reactivated the Attero device, an ancient machine designed to annihilate the Wraith. In doing so, they discover the reason the device was ultimately abandoned… Meanwhile, Todd continues to hold the Daedalus crew captive.

programme.title: Aftershock
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E03, After a recent earthquake which almost took his life, Hobie leaves California to live with his mother in Ohio. When they both show up at headquarters a few weeks later Mitch is surprised, especially when he hears the reason they are there.

programme.title: Baja Run
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E04, John Cort shows up at headquarters and convinces Mitch to compete in the Baja Run dune buggy race with him. What Mitch doesn’t know is Cort is keeping a secret which could land them both in a Mexican prison.

programme.title: Air Buchannon
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E05, Mitch has to work a 24-hour shift with Stephanie and entrusts Hobie with the responsibility of taking care of himself during that time. But Hobie becomes infatuated with an older girl and is pressured into throwing a party without Mitch’s knowledge.

programme.title: Shortsighted
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E06, Carter McKay has recently moved to Southern California to live with his father after his mother's death. When Hobie invites him to the annual father/son lifeguard competition Hobie learns the reason Carter is so embarrassed by his father.

programme.title: Someone to Baywatch Over Your
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E07, When a woman Mitch refers to as “The Mermaid” turns out to be the wife of a crime boss, an FBI agent comes to catch him before he can escape the country. Things become complicated when Mitch and the catty FBI Agent butt heads.

programme.title: K-Gas The Grooveyard of Solid Gold
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E08, The beach descends into chaos when DJ Larry "Loomin" Large announces a beach wide treasure hunt for a gold pirate doubloon worth $100,000. The Baywatch team is put on high alert when thousands of reckless treasure hunters storm the beach.

programme.title: Red Wind
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E09, When the hot Santa Ana winds move in from the desert, things start heating up on the Baywatch beach in more ways than one, as it seems like all the “weirdos” in the world have been blown to the beach.

programme.title: I Spike
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E10, Tracy, a lifeguard-turned-hovercraft expert, arrives at Baywatch to demonstrate the benefits of the new rescue vehicle. Meanwhile, The National Pro Beach Volleyball Tour arrives, reigniting Matt's desire to be a professional beach volleyball star.

programme.title: Silent Night Baywatch Night, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E11, Matt and Hobie rescue a young boy who is being harassed by a thug and take care of him until they can get him to his mother, but he seems to be hiding a deep dark secret. Meanwhile, CJ falls for a handsome young man who turns out to be taboo.

programme.title: Silent Night Baywatch Night, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E12, Joey joins Mitch and Hobie in decorating for Christmas. CJ has a great time working with Father Ryan but starts to worry that he may misinterpret her warmth as flirting, and that he may be considering quitting the priesthood for her.

programme.title: Rubber Ducky
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E13, Logan's visa is soon to expire, and he will be sent back to Australia unless he gets a green card. He plans on earning the money to purchase one in an upcoming boat race. Meanwhile Mitch’s mother visits.

programme.title: Homecoming
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E14, Stephanie is kidnapped by an eco-terrorist. The Baywatch team must stop the terrorist before she blows up an oil rig with Stephanie constrained inside it!

programme.title: Seize the Day
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E15, Mitch proposes to Tracy, but the happy moment is short-lived as she reveals she has a terminal illness. With the team being short-staffed it is up to Logan and Caroline to deal with reckless wave runners.

programme.title: A Little Help From My Friends
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E16, Mitch is still mourning Tracy’s death, so Hobie seeks help from a radio show to help Mitch recover. Caroline resuscitates a man with AIDS, which puts a strain on her relationship with Logan. And CJ enters a ballroom dancing competition.

programme.title: Father's Day
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E17, Mitch receives a mysterious package his father had put together before he died. Mitch and his father never saw eye-to-eye, but this gift impacts Mitch more than he ever thought possible. Logan visits a hypnotist to deal with a past trauma.

programme.title: Fire With Fire
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E18, Andy, an old friend of Mitch, visits Baywatch to complete four days of lifeguard service in order to remain on the active roster. But Andy's strong-arm tactics do not sit well with the other lifeguards.

programme.title: Deep Trouble
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E19, Matt and CJ stumble upon a homeless man who shockingly turns out to be someone they know very well. Meanwhile, Mitch must rescue a boy's brother from drug smugglers so the boy can receive a life-saving transplant of his brother's bone marrow.
